GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v5.10.85
GSD.description:
iio: accel: kxcjk-1013: Fix possible memory leak in probe and remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.85 by commit ee86d0bad80bdcd11a87e188a596727f41b62320, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit a25691c1f9674090fb66586cf4c5d60d3efdf339. For more details please see the references link.
